name: General's Ancient Helm
description:
When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> The character to which this is attached gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C301201]</color> that provides 2 $[K6] points.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> The character to which this is attached gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Unmovable Mountain</color> that provides 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext: "The last drop of blood had soaked into the battlefield, and the glazed sands shone gloriously once more."
